titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Arthur Vogel Papers TAM.195
titlestmt.author: Tamiment staff, 2010.

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-11-30 14:20:04 -0500.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.abstract: Arthur Vogel was a leftist playwright, and at one time probably a member of the Communist Party USA. The collection principally consists of typescripts of Vogel's unpublished plays. The collection also includes correspondence, other writings, and clippings.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials found in repository; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1997.066.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Arthur Vogel was a leftist playwright, and at one time probably a member of the Communist Party USA.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Arthur Vogel Papers; TAM 195; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection principally consists of typescripts of Vogel's unpublished plays. The collection also includes correspondence, other writings, and clippings.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Arthur Vogel was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
